DataElement.preferredName: Comorbid Ophthalmic Disease Next 30 Days Slit-lamp Examination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to signify whether or not an individual with a coexisting ophthalmic disease is likely to require slit-lamp examination within the next 30 days.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Comorbid Ophthalmolic Disease Next 30 Days Slit-lamp Examination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The coexistence of two or more disease processes._A surgical specialty concerned with the structure and function of the eye and the medical and surgical treatment of its defects and diseases._Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function._Subsequent; immediately following in time or order._A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30_The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day._Examination of the anterior segment of the eye using a medical instrument called a slit lamp.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The coexistence of two or more disease processes.:A surgical specialty concerned with the structure and function of the eye and the medical and surgical treatment of its defects and diseases.:Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Concepts.definition: The coexistence of two or more disease processes.
A medical specialty concerned with the structure and function of the eye and the medical and surgical treatment of its defects and diseases.

Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.:A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.::30:The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.       :Examination of the anterior segment of the eye using a medical instrument called a slit lamp.

Concepts.definition: Subsequent; immediately following in time or order.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
The time for Earth to make a complete rotation on its axis; ordinarily divided into twenty-four hours, equal to 86 400 seconds. This also refers to a specific day.
Examination of the anterior segment of the eye using a medical instrument called a slit lamp.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
